DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine whether use sequential high dose chemotherapy effective conventional dose ( i.e . 4 cycle cisplatin , etoposide , bleomycin [ PEB ] ) patient metastatic poor prognosis germ cell tumor .
DOC.brief_title: Conventional Dose Versus High Dose Sequential Chemotherapy Poor Prognosis Germ Cell Tumors
DOC.criteria: Clinical Histological diagnosis germ cell tumor Metastatic disease Poor prognostic category accord International Germ Cell Collaborative Group ( IGCCCG ) classification No prior chemotherapy metastatic disease Unwillingness accomplish study procedures Any exist comorbidity could limit administration high dose chemotherapy Any psychiatric disorder could impact study compliance
